name: Persuasion
contents:
Uses:
- Convince someone to do something, tell you something, etc
- Convince someone of a lie or fabrication
- Make someone feel a desired emotion
- Convince someone to agree to something
bodyHtml:
Uses:

  • Convince someone to do something, tell you something, etc
  • Convince someone of a lie or fabrication
  • Make someone feel a desired emotion
  • Convince someone to agree to something
